Tooltip.name: defaultOpen
Tooltip.description: Whether the tooltip is open by default (uncontrolled).

Tooltip.name: delay
Tooltip.description: The delay time for the tooltip to show up.

Tooltip.name: isDisabled
Tooltip.description: Whether the tooltip should be disabled, independent from the trigger.

Tooltip.name: isOpen
Tooltip.description: Whether the tooltip is open by default (controlled).

Tooltip.name: offset
Tooltip.description:
The additional offset applied along the main axis between the element and its
anchor element.

Tooltip.name: onOpenChange
Tooltip.description: Handler that is called when the tooltip's open state changes.

Tooltip.name: placement
Tooltip.description: The placement of the element with respect to its anchor element.

Tooltip.name: title
Tooltip.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | ReactFragment | ReactPortal
Tooltip.description: The content rendered within the tooltip.

Tooltip.name: trigger
Tooltip.description: By default, opens for both focus and hover. Can be made to open only for focus.
